Crop Compass

Launch Crop Compass website

About Crop Compass

Hack Oregon is a community-powered non-profit group, building civic data projects on different themes to promote engagement, awareness, and quality of life.

The Crop Compass website was created as part of the Summer / Fall 2015 project season. Crop Compass' theme was agriculture, and we wanted to find a way to showcase the fantastic and varied information about farming and land use in Oregon.
